trans-unit.source: Defines several color palettes that are commonly used by bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: 定義數個常用的點陣圖影像的色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: BitmapPalettes properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent.
trans-unit.target: BitmapPalettes 屬性 「 廣域網路 」 其名稱結尾有額外的"色彩 」，是完全透明的。

trans-unit.source: In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] image formats support palettes.
trans-unit.target: 只有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]影像格式支援調色盤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a black-and-white color palette.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示黑白色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: This palette consists of 2 colors total.
trans-unit.target: 這個調色盤是由 2 個色彩總計所組成。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a black, white, and transparent color palette.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，代表黑色、 白色與透明的色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: This palette consists of 3 colors total.
trans-unit.target: 這個調色盤包含共有 3 種色彩。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes> properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>「 廣域網路 」 其名稱結尾有額外的 [色彩]，屬性是完全透明的。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>

trans-unit.source: In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 16 shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示包含 16 色灰階色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: The palette ranges from black to gray to white.
trans-unit.target: 調色盤的範圍從黑色為灰色設為白色。

trans-unit.source: This palette contains 16 total colors.
trans-unit.target: 這個調色盤包含共有 16 種色彩。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 16 shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示包含 16 色灰階色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: The palette ranges from black to gray to white with an additional transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 調色盤的範圍從黑色為白色加上額外的透明色彩的灰色。

trans-unit.source: This palette contains 17 total colors.
trans-unit.target: 這個調色盤包含 17 總計的色彩。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes> properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>「 廣域網路 」 其名稱結尾有額外的 [色彩]，屬性是完全透明的。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes>

trans-unit.source: In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 256 shades of gray, ranging from black to gray to white.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示包含 256 色灰階，範圍是從黑色設為白色灰色的調色盤。

trans-unit.source: This palette contains 256 total colors.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 125 primary colors and 16 system colors, with duplicate colors removed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示包含 125 主要色彩和 16 系統色彩，以移除重複的色彩調色盤。

trans-unit.source: There are a total of 133 colors in this palette.
trans-unit.target: 共有的 133 這個調色盤的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate colors in the palette are removed.
trans-unit.target: 會移除重複的色彩調色盤中。

trans-unit.source: There are a total of 134 colors in this palette.

trans-unit.source: In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref>。
